Success.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller

Success.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success.author: Henry David Thoreau

Inspiration.text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Inspiration.author: Walt Disney

Inspiration.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Inspiration.author: Steve Jobs

Inspiration.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
Inspiration.author: Pablo Picasso

Perseverance.text: Perseverance is not a long race; it's many short races one after the other.
Perseverance.author: Walter Elliot

Perseverance.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Perseverance.author: Nelson Mandela

Perseverance.text: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Perseverance.author: Unknown

Leadership.text: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
Leadership.author: John C. Maxwell

Leadership.text: Leadership is not about a title or a designation.
Leadership.author: Robin S. Sharma

Leadership.text: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
Leadership.author: Ralph Nader

Confidence.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
Confidence.author: Christian D. Larson

Confidence.text: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
Confidence.author: Peter T. McIntyre

Confidence.text: With confidence, you have won before you have started.
Confidence.author: Marcus Garvey

Focus.text: Starve your distractions. Feed your focus.
Focus.author: Unknown

Focus.text: Focus is the key to success.
Focus.author: Unknown

Focus.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand.
Focus.author: Alexander Graham Bell

Growth.text: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
Growth.author: James Cash Penney

Growth.text: Don’t go through life, grow through life.
Growth.author: Eric Butterworth

Mindset.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
Mindset.author: Henry Ford

Mindset.text: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
Mindset.author: Vincent Van Gogh

Dreams.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Dreams.author: Walt Disney

Dreams.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
Dreams.author: Norman Vaughan

Dreams.text: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
Dreams.author: Bo Bennett

Discipline.text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
Discipline.author: Jim Rohn

Discipline.text: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
Discipline.author: Marie Forleo

Discipline.text: Without discipline, there's no life at all.
Discipline.author: Katharine Hepburn
